title: Welcome on
subtitle: The $t(common:appName.full) app
description: A mobile application designed for astronomy and space enthusiasts. With $t(common:appName.full), you can discover the vast universe from the palm of your hand. Explore planets, stars, galaxies, and constellations with detailed information and interactive visualizations. The app offers up-to-date news on astronomical events, space missions, and scientific discoveries. Additionally, it includes a learning section with educational articles, videos, and quizzes to test your knowledge. Whether you're an amateur astronomer or simply curious about the cosmos, $t(common:appName.full) is your gateway to delve into the mysteries of space.
